name: catachresis
text:
I have never been able to square this strip with myself.
He Is Five.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Five year old kids like to run around naked for no reason. I can attest to this from personal experience.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by recognizer, NaughtyByN8ture, m3funkyb)

name: m3funkyb
text: So what you're suggesting is that running around naked and defecating in the dining room are equally inappropriate. Little otters are supposed to experiment : D.

name: soticoto
text: That shit flies in asia.

name: slalvation
text: I used to have public nudity parties with my friends when I was five. We'd be outside the apartment building, or at the playground, and someone would declare 'butt party!!' and we'd shed our clothes and run in a circle. No joke.

name: tekende
text: "And that's how I came to be a ward of the state until I was 14."

name: dysphemism
text: Chubbied for the phrase "butt party", which for some reason is still capable of sending me into a giggling fit more suited to an eight-year-old girl at a slumber party.

name: soticoto
text:
I seem to recollect having nude races across the fields with my brothers when younger.

It is more awesome when you are told the fields were full of thistles, and everything came off.

Then some tourists went past the gate one time.

name: gunsofray
text:
Why would you watch a five year old running around naked?
Please don't say you had to jump on them to get them to stop..

name: starforth
text: He's an otter man.  Its natural.

name: dracer2
text: At least it doesn't show it going in.

name: fiyarburst
text:
Wait, three months prior to this, Ray was Five.
And I can't see Philippe's pants.

name: cuddlefish
text: otters age differently than we do. phillipe has also married a petunia and ran for president. ambitious little tot.

name: awko
text: Phillipe is a stuffed otter and stuffed toys can't age. He was born/made as five years old and five years old he shall remain.

name: bron
text: Roast Beef is the man.

name: dougthehead
text: Except he just completely cock-blocked Cornelius.  It is not classy to cock-block Cornelius.

name: dusty
text: As if anyone could cock-block Cornelius. This is a man not led by his genitals, but who could garner them an invitation to almost anywhere he sees fit.

name: jstegall
text: Philippe's shoes make me laugh.

name: fox
text:
*whole hearted agreement*
It's really too bad he wears such long pants.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: JOKE OVERLOAD [retry/abort]

name: chaesar
text: No Lyle, that is not cursive. That is LieBot's flux capacitor.

name: lizjones
text: A comment left by lizjones was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt, Doc_Rostov, dr_sexlove)

name: cousinted
text: The robot had it coming for a long time

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Notice Liebot's hand convulsing as Lyle is playing a lute solo on his cyborg guts.

name: deancain29
text: oh christ, Philippe hets his 'bone on'.... shiver.

name: elsie
text: Lyle has reason to be upset; he is, after all, a commercial-quality calligraphist.

name: rateoforange
text: I think the implication is the idea that Lyle is a calligraphist came up in conversation, since LB is responding to some positive statement.

name: harveymersault
text: There is, indeed, empirical evidence to this effect.

name: omegatron
text: Or did he become a calligraphist in response to the events in this strip?

name: nurdbot
text: Awesome. Lye sure put Liebot in his place.

name: ktistecmachine
text:
Lyle can't read cursive. But Todd can't read. It's okay though Todd, I laugh at such things as 70's tee-vee references.

Do you know that cursive is a script?

name: tetrisattack
text: Not enough parties end like this.

name: spectre
text: As the host, I hate it when the guests start rewiring each other right there in the living room.

name: spinynorman
text:
Or proclaiming suicidal thoughts.

This happens at every single one of my parties. My birthday was just a bunch of people in a circle, holding a gun to their heads one at a time, grimacing and struggling before losing the nerve and passing the gun along to the next person.

I got to change my decor, what the fuck.

name: c_dizzle
text: If you put them all in 1920's scuba suits it may make the faux-russian roulette experience slightly more enjoyable.

name: caseyb3
text: Man, I keep telling you 'Air Raid Sirens: The All-Time Classics' just isn't party music. Do you listen? You do not.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "The USB can look like cursive."

name: tellumo
text: I can kinda see the USB logo being the cursive form of some dark glyph from the realm of madness, denoting a concept too terrible for mortal ken.

name: honesttom
text: I am disturbed by the five-year-old-otter-on-otter action.

name: lawdog
text: A comment left by lawdog was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, recognizer, Zem, VictoriaW, foea)

name: cdl146
text: Why is it that the fact that they are naked automatically implies Bone? Sometimes kids just like to run around in the buff...

name: cheeks_jd
text: Is Ray telling LN to rub the girls love button?

name: philosophe
text: No it's what Ray was doing in the first strip Pat got pissed at him for talking about boning in.

name: philosophe
text: But maybe that's what Ray was doing in the first place.... ????

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Naw, he's telling him to give her a noogie.

name: ashoykh
text: Phillippe keeps his tie on while getting his bone on.  Classy.

name: nbgreene
text: this might be bad, but I am WAY more disturbed by Beef's decleration that he wants to committ suicide than by Philippe getting his bone on.

name: chrissketch
text: First appearance of Roast Beef's depression.

name: senatorexlax
text: I think it's funny because it's like, sometimes at a party one conversation will just get drowned out by another. In Roast Beefs case he is mentioning how he wants to kill himself but then Lyle starts kicking ass, so Beefs issues totally take a back seat. At that point you're like "what the fuck matters in my life if I can't even have a conversation." Thus the depression gets worse. (That was my drunk overthinking of Roast Beefs depression.)

name: pitseleh
text: This is one of my favorite strips...EVER. I <3 Philippe.

name: caseyb3
text: Every line in this strip is perfect; Todd responding to such a petty slur with 'what a fag!' is so very Todd - and Teodor's Great Gatsby angle is that sad kind of hysterical Onstad works best with. It is indeed one of the finer strips ever.

name: javonathan
text: Roast Beef tells Mr. Bear that he wants to kill himself. This makes Cornelius' female companion aware that Mr. Bear is a man that people go to about their problems.

name: chrissketch
text: I always just thought this was Beef's idea of appropriate party conversation. He saying it matter-of-factly.

name: professoryes
text: And neither Mr. Bear nor his companion are extremely surprised by this turn of events.

name: afronaut
text: He can't read cursive, yet he does caligraphy.

name: phy
text:
The cow says moo.
The duck says quack.
The lying robot tells lies.

name: tom-ba
text: And stupid, drunk squirrels believe them!

name: thegrayhoodie
text: This strip always reminds me of the fight at the Moontower in "Dazed and Confused".  It serves to warn you that the good times won't last, some asshole always has to shit in the birthday cake for everyone else.  (Lyle is an asshole)

name: rowboat
text: No way, man. Lie Bot has been begging for a beating since early times. That's the only party I care about - a Lie Bot disemboweling party.

name: thesyndicate88
text: Oh God yes I got the same thing. Thanks to watching that movie so much, I can't even listen to Tuesday's Gone without getting really depressed lol

name: mattylite
text: Damn, I thought you said "sit in the birthday cake."  I been diggin' around too much in Ray's porn collection.

name: zzzleepy
text: go philippe!

name: skoora
text: YES, LYLE, THAT IS CURSIVE!

name: iidebaser
text: This is the strip where I decided achewood was fucking brilliant.

name: drgetz
text: This by far one of the best. Poor Lyle lol.

name: jawsh
text:
what is with phillipe's shoes
kid must have some crazy arches

name: coco
text: I like to think that while all of this is going on, Philippe is still standing there with the same expression on his face . . . it was only a matter of time though . . .

name: ruderuderudy
text: Achewood knocks the cock off anything.  This particular strip is like some sort of reverse prism, where all the different elements blend into one pure, white light.

name: puguglypress
text: The ends of the really good arcs are always like that. Well put!

name: tekende
text: I like how Liebot looks so dispassionate about Lyle wrecking his wiring.

name: zapatos
text:
He's probably making fun of him for it.

"No Lyle, actually that isn't cursive."

name: epoc_jones
text:
then he's all, 'the HELL it ain't!'

and he looks at it for a second, getting up and then takes a swig from a bottle, muttering.
